title: Cloud Computing

title: Java 1
description: Covers Java basics including syntax, variables, control structures, and object-oriented programming principles.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: This note provides a deep overview of basic algorithms used in sorting, searching, and graph traversal.

title: Database Systems
description: Relational models, queries, and normalization techniques covered thoroughly.

title: Operating Systems
description: Concepts of process management, memory allocation, and scheduling.

title: Computer Networks
description: An overview of networking layers, protocols, and architectures.

title: Web Development Basics
description: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript foundations for frontend design.

title: Information Security
description: Covers encryption basics, vulnerabilities, and secure practices.

title: Marketing Fundamentals
description: Key concepts in marketing strategy, segmentation, and consumer behavior.

title: Financial Planning
description: Techniques for budgeting, forecasting, and managing corporate finances.

title: Organizational Behavior
description: Study of individual and group behavior within organizations.

title: Software Testing
description: Principles and practices of unit, integration, and system testing.

title: Data Structures
description: Detailed look at arrays, lists, trees, graphs, and their algorithms.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Building and deploying cross-platform mobile applications.
